#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector < vector < int > > graph;
int ans = 999999, cnt, n, d, a, b,cost=10;
bool visited[1000];
void traverse(int a) {
	visited[a] = true;
	for(int i=0; i<graph[a].size();i++) {
		if(visited[graph[a][i]]==false) {
			cnt++;
			traverse(graph[a][i]);
		}
	}
}
int main() {
	graph.clear();
	scanf("%d %d ",&n,&d);
	cin>>cost;
	graph.resize(n);
	for(int i=0;i<d;i++) {
		scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		graph[a-1].push_back(b-1);
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		for(int j=0;j<1001;j++)
			visited[j]=false;
		cnt =1;
		traverse(i);
		ans = min(cnt,ans);
	}
	cout<<ans*cost;
	//printf("%d\n",(cost));
	return 0;
}
